name: Sword Wraith Warrior
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Martial Fury
entries: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
